name: LINE demo version!
description:
You're in a small room, with no identifiable exit. It's dark, there is a noise below...

Navigate through the labyrinth, reach freedom.

Dev note: This is only a demo, the full version will contain 200+ levels, jumpscares, multiple endings and a soundtrack. This demo includes 3 levels and no soundtrack, there may be bugs, as it is in very early developement.
